fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Manually give armor to a player. You may only do this once.
- Set up a trap tonight, disabling your first attribute and attacking all players who visit you while granting yourself Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Those who visit you gain armor, increasing their Defense tier by 1 tier permanently. They will not be aware of the upgrade. This can stack multiple times.
